dish_name: Apple Pie with Pumpkin Caramel Sauce
description: Apple Pie with Pumpkin Caramel Sauce is easy to make using a store bought pie and a simple, two ingredient topping.
ingredients: [{"name": "Marie Callendar's Dutch Apple Pie", "units": null, "amount": 1}, {"name": "store bought hot caramel sauce", "units": "cup", "amount": 1}, {"name": "pumpkin puree", "units": "cup", "amount": 0.25}, {"name": "pumpkin pie spice", "units": "teaspoon", "amount": 0.5}]
instructions: Bake pie according to package instructions. Let cool slightly. For the pumpkin caramel sauce, place all 3 ingredients in a small, heavy saucepan over low heat. Stir until completely combined and smooth, about 1-2 minutes. Serve warm, drizzled over pie slices.
